.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.2.1 (2015-06-16)
---------------------
* add `strip_prefix` option to `load_env`

0.2.0 (2015-06-16)
---------------------
* add `load_env` (python api)

0.1.4 (2015-06-15)
---------------------

* Check if file to run exists and is executable

0.1.3 (2015-06-01)
---------------------

* Support for env file comments by '#'

0.1.2 (2015-06-01)
---------------------

* Return code from runned command

0.1.1 (2015-05-31)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.
